heading: Casting
welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.
description:
We provide a wide range of casting materials and sizes.

Our factories offer advanced sand casting and investment casting technologies.
materials: Gray Iron (EN-GJL): GJL-150, GJL-200, GJL-250, GJL-300, GJL-350
Ductile Iron (EN-GJS): GJS-400-18-LT, GJS-500-7, GJS-600-3, GJS-700-2, GJS-800-2
Austempered Ductile Iron (ADI): ADI 800-10, ADI 1050-6, ADI 1200-3, ADI 1400-1
